title: Adding an "Inappropriate Behavior" category in the reporting section
body:
I submitted a request on this particular subject to the support team on League and Player Support Specialist Rigor Mortis suggested I take it here...

There is an increase in unwanted sexual conversation during my gameplay! Whether it is people talking about porn sites or (mostly) how horny they are, I can't get away from it. I tell them that that they are being nasty and inappropriate but there isn't really a report category for that particular behavior. Please consider adding this category in the reporting section.

Thank you!

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
As long as they're not trolling or being toxic, I don't see why saying 'im horny' is a bad thing.

Kids nowadays know about sex before they even turn 10. 

If you don't like what people are talking about or it's distracting you from playing...you can mute them.
I think the point is, the OP views explicit talk like that as inappropriate.  They should report it and Riot will determine from there.
Dafuq O_o damn horny 12 year olds ruining league :( feelsbadman

I think this would fall under Verbal Abuse.  It's similar enough.  If we added this category than it would make confusion between Unsportsmanlike Conduct and/or Verbal Abuse.  I understand it is different but I'm just thinking about the sake of parsimony in report options.
